DOCNAME: CASE OF MEHMET SALİH UÇAR v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Administrative proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in Batman .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant lodged a case with ORG against ORG for the annulment of an administrative decision refusing his request for compensation of disability .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court issued a decision of non - jurisdiction and transferred the case to ORG , which dismissed the applicant ’s claim on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s request for rectification introduced on DATE was rejected by ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the judgment was notified to the applicant .
